Description: We are seeking skilled and responsible drivers to join our company who will ensure the safe and timely transportation of materials, equipment, and personnel to various project sites.You must have a valid UAE Driving License, and a good driving record.Skills
Skills:
Time Management: Effective time management skills are necessary to meet delivery deadlines and manage schedules, minimizing delays and ensuring efficient use of time during work hours.
The role demands physical endurance for tasks like loading/unloading cargo.
Possession of an up-to-date and valid driver's license is necessary.
Interacting professionally with customers is a core aspect of this role.
This position requires individuals who can handle physically demanding responsibilities.
Adequate physical strength is necessary to manage tasks like cargo handling.
